mapper.select: SELECT place_id, place_name,COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) AS address_name ,place_url,place_img,place_long,place_lat,place_category_detail FROM camping WHERE COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) LIKE concat('%', #{region}, '%') order by #{sort_type} #{order} limit #{start},10

SELECT place_id, place_name,COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) AS address_name ,place_url,place_img,place_long,place_lat,place_category_detail FROM camping WHERE COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) LIKE concat('%', #{region}, '%') and place_name LiKE concat('%', #{place_name}, '%') and place_category_detail LiKE concat('%', #{place_category_detail}, '%') order by place_name COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci asc place_name COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci desc limit #{start},10
